references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work in the target paper, establishing the power of diffusion models for image generation, which is the basis of the approach in the target paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper extends diffusion models to high-resolution image synthesis, a key improvement for the target paper's approach to generate complex scenes.
This paper demonstrates high-resolution text-to-3D content creation using diffusion models, providing a relevant and closely related prior work to the target paper.
This paper is a key comparative work in the target paper, demonstrating an existing method that addresses multi-object 3D control in images and providing a performance benchmark for the new approach.

references.paper_title: Zero-1-to-3: Zero-shot one image to 3d object
references.reason: This paper provides a strong baseline method for the target paper, demonstrating zero-shot image-to-3D object generation and providing a comparison for the new approach.
